Articles.Content:
I have a hard time using the usi colony pack for ksp can anyone help me 

the big problem to be asked

------------------------------------

TRASPORTATION

Welcome aboard! What exactly are you trying to do, and what is the difficulty you're having?

 

Also, moved this to the Gameplay Questions forum.

Welcome to the Forums!

USI Kolonization is possibly the most complex mod that exists for KSP. If you are undaunted by that, I recommend you head on over to the mod's own forum thread, where a lot of people who are very well used to the mechanics hang out. You will get the best help there. This Forum is more for general how to play KSP questions, and less for the intricate details of individual mods.
